andromeda.why: Foundational inquiry into how answers work; not a sovereignty-restoration or rescue vector.

arcturus.why: Lays the logical base: hypothesis, definitions, test conditions—classic Arcturan system-coherence setup.

draco.why: Early ‘I’m right’ correctness policing can surface under stress.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rigid formulas for safety can ossify into obedience-to-doctrine.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal of discipline: hold to reason while the unknown presses in.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to being ‘wrong’ or unreceived modulates how/when the first answers are offered.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching formulation; no sacred-law transmission yet.

andromeda.why: Natural answerer protecting energy from misuse ≠ anti-domination action.

arcturus.why: Innate knack for clean, functional answers; resists interference to keep the signal coherent.

draco.why: Projection pressure can trigger ‘prove-it’ posturing or correctness dominance.

orion-dark.why: Being cast as ‘the answer authority’ can slide into doctrinal compliance demands.

orion-light.why: The ordeal is to answer only when correctly invited; restraint proves integrity.

pleiades.why: Shy/natural dynamic; attunes to when others are truly ready to receive.

sirius.why: Practical answering, not formal instruction/initiatory teaching yet.

andromeda.why: Trial-and-error with answers is resilience, not liberation work.

arcturus.why: Stress-testing hypotheses under real conditions to evolve a functional logic stack.

draco.why: Criticism can provoke competitive defensiveness and rank-guarding.

orion-dark.why: Forcing premature conformity to ‘the right answer’ to escape ambiguity.

orion-light.why: Initiatory grind: wrong answers refine courage and method until clarity emerges.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to being judged colors how iteration proceeds.

sirius.why: Self-forging logic phase; no transmission of sacred law yet.

andromeda.why: Networking answers for utility ≠ chain-breaking mission.

arcturus.why: Converts logic into usable guidance for the network—clean protocols and shared mental maps.

draco.why: Success can attract clique gatekeeping or status filters on ‘who gets the answer.’

orion-dark.why: Risk of turning protocols into rigid orthodoxy inside the network.

orion-light.why: Steadiness in sharing only what’s tested—others pass a light ordeal by aligning to reason.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement helps time the answer so it can be received.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-logic: translating tested reasoning into guidance others can follow.

andromeda.why: Projection dynamics around ‘fix it for all’ ≠ liberation action.

arcturus.why: Universalizing answer-projection → burnout/scapegoat when reality resists one-size-fits-all (Arcturan shadow).

draco.why: Crisis can trigger dominance tactics to force acceptance of ‘the answer.’

orion-dark.why: Authority capture: enforcing doctrine/compliance to preserve image of ‘the fix.’

orion-light.why: Integrity-under-projection: hold to what actually works, not what flatters.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing/appeasement can distort logic to gain acceptance.

sirius.why: Mostly boundary/projection work here, not formal sacred instruction.

andromeda.why: Role-model objectivity isn’t a direct anti-oppression mission.

arcturus.why: Mature logical poise: clean methods, clear standards, humorous detachment—system-stability exemplar.

draco.why: Authority aura can drift into status protection/correctness policing.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine-lock risk: elevating formulas over living inquiry.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: hold courage and fairness as the mind teaches through example.

sirius.why: Royal instruction by example—pedagogy-by-reason; others learn correct thinking from your stance.
